ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: The 3D Scatter Chart demo shows how to create 3D Scatter Chart with three-dimentional markers chart using the SciChart 3D Component.
ExampleDefinition.Description:
The 3D Scatter chart is defined by the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.Model.XyzDataSeries3D%603.html']XyzDataSeries3D[/url] and the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.RenderableSeries.ScatterRenderableSeries3D.html']ScatterRenderableSeries3D[/url].
Scatter points can be colored individually, programmatically selected and scaled using the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.Model.PointMetadata3D.html']PointMetadata3D[/url] class. PointMetadata also allows you to tag individual scatter points with a business object of any type.
